citation.abstract: Early supported discharge (ESD) seems to be a promising alternative to conventional follow-up care after acute stroke. We have previously shown that stroke unit care combined with ESD has beneficial effects on functional outcome and the use of resources for up to 1 year. The aim of this trial was to evaluate outcome after 5 years.
citation.publisher: The Stroke Unit, St. Olavs Hospital, Trondheim University Hospital, Medisinsk klinikk, Pb. 3250, 7006 Trondheim, Norway. hild.fjaertoft@stolav.no
citation.title: Stroke Unit Care Combined With Early Supported Discharge Improves 5-Year Outcome A Randomized Controlled Trial
